DOC.brief_summary: This study assess current VHV ( VHV=CHW , community health worker ) scope expand include iCCM group intervention provide improved access treatment child . In rural SW Uganda , iCCM provide lay volunteer , increase proportion child diarrhoea receive ORS/Zn , ARI receive anti-biotics , fever/malaria receive anti-malarials ?
DOC.brief_title: HCU : Can VHVs Trained ICCM Improve Care Children
DOC.criteria: Women live intervention comparison villages Mother least one child 59 month old No living child
